headline: Future of money
deck: Meet the money changers: entrepreneurs and inventors transforming the way we pay
Silicon Valley sees money as digits and algorithms — while the rest of the world views currency through an emotional lens.
Like AMC’s Synths, robo-advisers are developing a human side.
Want to spend your bitcoin? Visa has a card for that.

headline: Did you know?

headline: $2.4 million
